snippet: Arian Foster, the only runner to gain at least 100 yards in each of his first three playoff games, says the Texans can beat the Patriots if they dominate time of possession.
lead_paragraph: Arian Foster, the only runner to gain at least 100 yards in each of his first three playoff games, says the Texans can beat the Patriots if they dominate time of possession.

headline.seo: A.F.C. — Texans’ Arian Foster Speaks Like a Shaman and Runs Like an All-Pro
headline.main: Speaking Like a Shaman, Running Like the Wind
headline.print_headline: Speaking Like a Shaman, Running Like the Wind
